card_text: While you control an "Odd-Eyes" monster, your opponent's monsters cannot target this card for attacks. While this card is in face-up Defense Position, your "Odd-Eyes" monsters cannot be destroyed by battle, also you take no battle damage from that battle. You can target 1 Level 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but negate its effects, then, immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 monster using only this card and the Summoned monster. You can only use this effect of "Performapal Miss Director" once per turn.
